body: Hi everyone,  I am trying to show the VSC (vertical sky component) over the facade of a building but turns out the output I get is 14 times bigger that the number of points in my grid, and therefore the "Ladybug re-color mesh" component fails to work. Does anyone know why is are the results larger than my grid and how could I make it work?  Thanks!
